title: Carboxylation reactions for the sustainable manufacture of chemicals and monomers
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00482E, Critical Review

Salvador Ordóñez, Laura Faba
Carboxylation stands out as one of the most versatile and viable routes for carbon dioxide fixation, a crucial chemical transformation essential for advancing capture technologies and fostering a sustainable industry....
